page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: {MACHINERY}:- Tractors,sprayers,mowers, milking machines, bulk freezing tanks, muck spreaders,combine harvesters, balers, potato picker & planters, disc & chain harrows, forage harvester trailer and flails. {TYPES}:- Mainly dairy and mixed Peas and beans are grown as a cash crop. The land is poor because it is very acidic. Animals are no longer used on farms many of which are now computerised. Local cattle markets are in Haywards Heath,Lewes & Chichester. No farm is totally self sufficient. {HAZARDS}:-Rabbits, pigeons, foxes & crows are all farm pests. Reckless drivers and deer damage fences & hedges. Trespassers leave gates open. A common cause of death is birth & foot and mouth disease is often a hazard.
